text: Jussi Uusipaavalniemi (born June 19, 1965 in Hyvinkää, Finland) is a Finnish male curler.Uusipaavalniemi, Jussi | Curling.fi He started curling in 1979 at the age of 14. He is the brother of Finnish male curler Markku Uusipaavalniemi. ==Awards== *Collie Campbell Memorial Award: 1992, 1997. ==Teams== ===Men's=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" width=70| Season !
